alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 8:58PM MST until July 26 at 9:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 945 PM MST. * At 858 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gold Canyon, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, Gold Canyon, Granite Reef Dam, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Florence Junction, Saguaro Lake, Queen Valley, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, and Goldfield Ranch. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 193 and 218. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 188 and 201. AZ Route 202 near mile marker 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
